text: 235 (two hundred [and] thirty-five) is the integer following 234 and preceding 236. ==In mathematics== 235 is: *a semiprime. *a heptagonal number. *a centered triangular number. *therefore a figurate number in two ways. *palindromic in bases 4 (32234), 7 (4547), 8 (3538), 13 (15113), 46 (5546) and 234 (11234) *a Harshad number in bases 6, 47, 48, 95, 116, 189 and 231. *a Smarandache–Wellin number Also: *There are 235 different trees with 11 unlabeled nodes. *If an equilateral triangle is subdivided into smaller equilateral triangles whose side length is 1/9 as small, the resulting "matchstick arrangement" will have exactly 235 different equilateral triangles of varying sizes in it. ==In science== *U-235 is the fissile isotope of uranium used in the first atomic bombs. ==See also== *List of highways numbered 235 ==References== Category:Integers
title: 235 (number)
